message: Neither man seems to have any interest in stopping.
Quite the opposite, in fact. They're both obviously itching for a fight.

name: 紅雀
message: "Alright... Let's do this!"
The moment Koujaku and Noiz make contact, the Ribsteez and Rhymers surrounding them start to brawl.
It quickly devolves into total chaos, with people who clearly just want to fight getting in on the action. The alley shakes with their howls of joy.
Forget about the other people. I've gotta stop Koujaku and Noiz!
But before I can cut in between them, a man comes flying at me.

name: 野次馬Ａ
message: "You're a fucking Rhymer, aren't you?!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Whoooa!"
I jump out of the way as he winds up for a punch, and he tumbles forward when it misses.
I instinctively chop down at his unguarded neck.

name: 野次馬Ａ
message: "Ugh!"
His knees buckle and he falls on his face.
That was close. I'm gonna get dragged into this if I'm not careful.

name: 野次馬Ｂ
message: "Hiyah!"
Too late!

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ngh!"
A man whips his arm toward me. I spot the glint of steel.

name: 蒼葉
message: "That's not a fucking toy!"
When he stabs at me again, I catch his arm and pull it down, kneeing him in the chin as he stumbles.

name: 野次馬Ｂ
message: "Guh!"
The man drops the knife as he falls backward, and I kick it away. I also give him a gentle kick in the face while I'm at it.

name: 野次馬Ｂ
message: "Guh."

name: 蒼葉
message: "For fuck's sake..."
I look around and quickly locate Koujaku and Noiz.
They're going at it like a pair of wolves, oblivious to the chaos around them.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Koujaku! Noi―"

name: 悪島
message: "What the fuck are you scumbags doing?!"
Instantly, the fighting stops. Everyone turns to face the voice that tore through the alley like a thunderclap.
And then―
Everyone starts running.
It's Akushima!
Armed policemen flood the alley.

name: 悪島
message: "What's going on here?! Rhyme?! Rib?! Either way, the sentence is death!!!"

name: 紅雀
message: "Aoba!"
Koujaku fights his way to me against the flow of the crowd.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Where's Noiz?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Long gone. We gotta hightail it too!"
Koujaku grabs my arm and we start running.

name: 悪島
message: "Stop right there, criminal scum!!!"
We race down the alley, Akushima's shouts echoing behind us.
